description:
This market will resolve to "Gen.G Global Academy" if Gen.G Global Academy win against Hanwha Life Esports Challengers in the named LoL match in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Group Stage, scheduled for January 15 at 12:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Hanwha Life Esports Challengers" if Hanwha Life Esports Challengers win against Gen.G Global Academy in the LoL match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
